column5: Anybody currently using the iFish app? I have the iHunter app and find it useful.
You mean this one Rob ? https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.theappdoor.ifish.ontario&hl=en_CA Not very many good reviews

Im not a big fan of sharing fishing spots. It makes the learning curve zero and floods spots with boats. People post a picture of a musky and then Where they caught it. That post stays online forever so now anyone can look that up and everyone will fish that spot.

This is the reason I seldom post fishing pictures online.If I do I blur or alter the background or make the person turn to open water so it’s harder to recognize. We put a lot of time and effort into finding those spots and it could take no time for them to be blown up.
I figured the apps were similar, but that doesn't seem to be the case. I use the ihunter app for maps, WLU boundaries and seasons. I was hoping the fishing app was the same. Thanks for the fed-back.
Seen a pic from a buddy he posted . I sent him an email stating I knew where he was . He said how . I said see the large crane in the back ground ? He quickly removed the pic. LOL
